content: Weakly-supervised machine learning researcher with his human-friendly big AI dream. He is enjoying his postdoc journey at Quebec Artificial Intelligence Institute (Mila) to prepare for the coming AI winter, as Eddard Stark said “He won’t be a boy forever and winter is coming” – Game of Thrones. He is privileged to work with Chris Pal.
